name: Gluten-Free Vegan Banana Nut Bread
author: My Healthy Kitchen
summary: It is time to indulge without any of the guilt in one of America's favorites... Banana nut bread. This recipe has all the flavor and taste but with no added sugar or oil. Completely gluten free and vegan.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan with cooking spray
Mix boiling water and flax seeds together in a bowl
Combine bananas, applesauce, and vanilla extract in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended
Add dates slowly, while the food processor is running
Add flaxseed mixture and blend until smooth
Mix oat flour, tapioca starch, baking powder, cinnamon, and baking soda in a large bowl
Pour in banana mixture; mix well until a batter forms
Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 55 to 65 minutes
